generated_text:
{
  "title": "Taco Bowl Recipe",
  "serving_size": 4,
  "ingredients": {
    "Garlic": "3 cloves, minced",
    "Carrots": "1 cup, diced",
    "Celery": "1 stalk, chopped",
    "Jalapenos": "1, diced",
    "Cilantro": "1/4 cup, chopped",
    "Potatoes": "2, diced",
    "Bell Pepper": "1, diced",
    "Chicken": "1 lb, cooked and shredded",
    "Butter": "2 tbsp",
    "Olive Oil": "2 tbsp",
    "Cumin": "1 tsp",
    "Smoked Paprika": "1 tsp",
    "Cayenne": "1/4 tsp",
    "Oregano": "1/2 tsp",
    "Table Salt": "1 tsp",
    "Pepper": "1/2 tsp",
    "Shredded Cheese": "1 cup",
    "Tomato": "1, diced",
    "Lettuce": "2 cups, shredded",
    "Onion": "1, diced",
    "Black Beans": "1 can, drained and rinsed",
    "Lime": "1, juiced"
  },
  "instructions": [
    "In a large skillet, heat olive oil over medium heat.",
    "Add garlic, carrots, celery, and jalapenos. Saute for 5 minutes.",
    "Add potatoes, bell pepper, cumin, smoked paprika, cayenne, oregano, salt, and pepper. Cook for another 10 minutes or until vegetables are tender.",
    "Add cooked chicken to the skillet and stir to combine. Cook for an additional 5 minutes.",
    "In a separate pan, melt butter and cook the diced onions until translucent.",
    "Add black beans and diced tomato to the onions. Cook for 5 minutes.",
    "To assemble the taco bowls, divide shredded lettuce among 4 bowls. Top with the vegetable and chicken mixture.",
    "Sprinkle shredded cheese, chopped cilantro, and a squeeze of lime juice on top of each bowl.",
    "Serve the taco bowls warm and enjoy!"
  ]
}
